data.title: Mystery Game Software
data.meta_description: Mystery Game Software games, from Mystery Game Central.
data.text:
Use your powers of observation and deduction to unlock glimpses of events from the past and solve an 80 year old mystery!

Plunge into a mysterious detective story! Find stolen property, solve the enigmatic riddle and perhaps you can expose the villain! By Realore Studios.

Stop Count Olaf's horrid reign with fire, snake bites, leeches, and other wieldy machinations in this game of deductive reasoning. By Oberon Media.

Use your Hidden Object skills to help Alex solve mysterious crimes. Find the clues to close the case and capture the crooks!

Pack your bags . . . for murder. Join Agatha Christie's famed sleuth, Miss Marple, in this classic whodunit Hidden Object game!

Ten people, each with something to hide and something to fear, are invited to a lonely mansion on Shipwreck Island by a host who, surprisingly, fails to appear. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Solve this classic Agatha Christie murder mystery as you play the role of Detective Hercule Poirot, in this exciting Seek and Find adventure! By Oberon Media.

Famous detective Hercule Poirot is back in typical style, turning up at just the right time to begin an investigation into the murder of a famous actress during what should have been the start of a relaxing holiday. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Based on the famous mystery novel by the Queen of Crime, Agatha Christie, this adventure game is filled with spectacular twists-and-turns and includes a surprising ending different from the original novel. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Fans of Agatha Christie and great seek and find games alike, rejoice! Hercule Poirot is at it again in another mystery of murderous proportions! By Oberon Media.

Track a thief to reveal forgeries and solve the crime! By So What!.

This is the story of young FBI agent Nicole Bonnet, whose first task is to solve a series of macabre murders. By City Interactive.

The sun has set and the mist that falls on the rugged landscape blankets danger. But if only that were all you need to be concerned about. The eerie Cornish landscape springs to life in this haunting mystery adventure game. By Got Game Entertainment.

The suspense is building in Becky Brogan's first mystery. Visit chilling scenes as you uncover the eerie secrets of the past in Meane Manor! By MumboJumbo.

A murder has been committed in an old English castle. Investigate 12 suspects and a castle full of booby-trapped rooms in this engaging whodunit! By Oberon Media.

Gather clues as you seek objects hidden amidst unexplored crime scenes, and decipher puzzles that will lead you closer to the criminal mastermind! By IWin.

Help Carol investigate the death of a local resident! Stop a cult before they strike again in Black Circle: A Carol Reed Mystery. By Merscom.

Embittered medium Lauren Blackwell and her spirit guide Joey Mallone are the only ones who can stop an enigmatic killer from striking again. By Wadjet Eye Games.

Unearth hundreds of items in beautiful and unique locations throughout the city to uncover the dark mysteries of a secret society in this hidden object game. By Merscom.

Local painter Christina Falk asks Carol for help regarding some strange recent occurrences. When Christina is found dead, Carol is drawn into a 600 year old mystery. By Merscom.

Only with nerves of steel and a clear mind can you live through the fright of this fateful night. Try to escape The Hookman and make it out alive! By Gamehouse.

Help Cate West find clues, compile evidence, track down the hideout, and name the culprit in more than 75 levels of hidden object fun! By Gamenauts, Inc..

Help the celebrated novelist, Cate West, uncover the hidden secrets and a dangerous murderer in this exciting seek and find adventure! By Gamenauts, Inc..

Solve the mystery that's kept everyone guessing for more than 50 years. By RealArcade.

Join the investigative team from the original, top-rated forensic TV series, Cold Case Files! By Activision.

As a brilliant young FBI agent named Martin Mystere, you have been called upon to investigate the savage murder of a highly reputed scientist. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Join the famous CSI team in Las Vegas and investigate five all new cases using the latest forensic science. By Ubisoft.

Enter the stark world of CSI, with locations and music taken straight from the hit TV show. By Ubisoft.

Team up with the entire cast of CSI and a new, improved crime lab to track down the heinous truth in five complex new crimes. No crime is ever perfect. Your job is to find the flaw. By Ubisoft.

Join Gil Grissom, Catherine Willows and the rest of the CSI Las Vegas cast to break down the evidence and bring suspects to justice in five all-new, bizarre crimes. By Ubisoft.

Inspired by the hit TV show, CSI: Miami gives players the opportunity to experience forensic investigation first hand. By Ubisoft.

Go on an adventure with Inspector Dupin! Monsieur Mark Davies has reported his wife missing and now it's up to you to help!

Go on an adventure with Inspector Dupin! Monsieur Mark Davies has reported his wife missing and now it's up to you to help!

Your client is falsely accused of murder and only your keen eye for detail can find the evidence to bring the truth to light.

Help young psychic Delaware St. John figure out the tragic events of years past and put unsettled spirits to rest! By Big Time Games.

The sound of a hundred voices call to Delaware and lead him to the site of a decrepit amusement park. Can you help psychic detective Delaware St. John discover the secrets behind The Seacliff Tragedy? By Big Time Games.

Help Delaware St. John explore the remains of a ghost town to figure out the mystery of what happened. By Big Time Games.

Help Department 42 collect nine mysterious and evil artifacts and protect the world! Stop pure evil and save the day!

Lights, Camera, Action! Find clues and decode puzzles in 160 star-studded levels to solve the case and save Hollywood! By NevoSoft.

Take an ominous trip with Dominic and help him piece together a mystery from his dreams in Dominic Crane 2: Dark Mystery Revealed!

Dominic Crane's been having recurring dreams about places he's never been to. Uncover the meaning behind the mysterious dreams!

Discover an interactive seek and find adventure, filled with thrilling discoveries, potentially paranormal activity and sordid secrets! By Oberon Media.

Follow the crystal clear dreams you've been having about a missing little girl! Use them as a guide to find and save her.

Carol's summer plans are interrupted by another mystery! Follow this super sleuth as she gets wrapped up in her most complex case! By Merscom.

Explore the underbelly of Oz as Emerald City's most cunning detective! Unravel a conspiracy of intrigue in this twist on the timeless classic! By Wadjet Eye Games.

Explore beautiful underwater temples and search for hidden artifacts to uncover the dark secrets of the Evil Empress and her hideous plans! By Game Agents.

An unexpected storm has left you shipwrecked! Seek and find cleverly hidden objects and solve puzzles to find a way off the island! By SpinTop Games.

You're after one of the most dangerous people in the world - a notorious serial killer known as 'The Phoenix'. The authorities need your help to catch him once and for all. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Who will you trust? Make choices and solve puzzles to discover the mysteries behind your dreams in the adventure of a lifetime, Fatal Hearts! By Hanako Games.

Solve the riddles surrounding the Mayan artifacts to uncover what really happened to the royal family in Forgotten Riddles! By Big Fish Games.

Between treble clefs and Forgotten Riddles, can you solve the mystery behind the Moonlight Sonatas and learn the secrets of the Opera House? By Big Fish Games.

Save your beloved from certain doom in the house of Lord Albrecht von Frankenstein, mad scientist, where she is his latest experiment! This game is a twisted hidden-object adventure filled with horror and humor and mystery. By Digital Distribution SAS.

You have been called to Majesty Manor to investigate a possible haunting or uncover a cruel hoax. Search for clues and solve this haunted mystery! By Aisle 5 Games.

Become a ghost and master your new paranormal skills to unravel the secrets of your life-after-death adventure! By Merscom.

Recover keys to the thirteen homes a famous reporter was investigating and solve this hundred year old mystery once and for all! By Gaming Hungama-Gamespin.

The Greystone interactive murder mystery challenges the reader to solve the murder mystery before the killer cuts down another victim. By Malinche Entertainment.

Explore a decrepit mental asylum and find your missing boyfriend in Haunted Halls - Green Hills Sanitarium!

Flora Dale is in a deep coma and you must help her solve complex puzzles to regain her memory and discover her attacker. By SpinTop Games.

Interactive novel puts players in the middle of a mystery as femme fatales and shady bellboys bring this 'video game book' for the Nintendo DS to life. By Nintendo.

Help inspector Francesca di Porta scrutinize an intriguing story of suspicion, prosecution and conspiracy! By Intenium.

If you like to snuggle up beside the warmth of your computer with a good 'ol "who-dun-it", you'll love Inspector Parker to death! By Oberon Media.

FBI agent Jane Angel's investigation into medieval coin smuggling soon leads her around the world in search of the missing treasures of the Knights Templar! Could she actually find the Holy Grail? By IWin.

Discover a lost treasure by solving puzzles and exploring in Jessica - Mysterious Journey, a fun Hidden Object game.

Discover all new scrolling search screens that put you in the front seat of whizzing planes and a whirlwind adventure! By IWin.

Join Rupert and Emma on another adventure-filled Jewel Quest through the land of Egypt, where mystery reigns and only a keen eye can help you! By IWin.

Search crime scenes for evidence, question witnesses, solve puzzles, interrogate suspects and piece together all the clues to catch the murderer. By Legacy Interactive.

Organized crime is taking over Metro City! Use your Mahjongg skills, Detective, to unearth clues and bring the criminals to justice! By Oberon Media.

Lose yourself in a thrilling tale of mystery, intrigue, and adventure on a distant tropical island in Marooned, the first chapter of a riveting new trilogy from GameHouse. By Gamehouse.

The New York fashion world is turned upside down when a serial killer has an eye for design and a thirst for murder! By Big Blue Bubble.

Help solve an ancient mystery as you discover and capture Edgar Allan Poe`s murderer! Collect clues and crack the conspiracy!

Find hidden objects in a haunted mansion with over 30 rooms! Challenge ghosts in unique minigames and unravel the mysteries of the ghosts' unfortunate fates through in-game comics. By Namco Networks.

Hunt down the information and clues you need, to find the identity of a serial killer before it's too late. A madman's brutal killings have to be stopped and only have the skills & knowledge required to solve the mystery. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Search a ghostly setting for scattered secrets, broken objects, and the key components to a mysterious machine in this spooky investigation! By Paprikari.

Monks, murder, and above all, suspense. An old abbey is the scene of a series of mysterious murders, and only one man can put a stop to the slaughter. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Welcome to a world of danger and suspense in Murder Island: Secret of Tantalus, a thrilling Hidden Object Adventure game!

When murder rears its ugly head in Cabot Cove, players join Jessica Fletcher and her insatiable curiosity to solve the mystery in Murder, She Wrote! By Legacy Interactive.

Help Sara find her missing husband and stop an evil pirate's ancient curse in Mystery Case Files: 13th Skull! By Big Fish Games.

Use your wits and Hidden Object talents to follow the trail of a group of missing graduate students in Mystery Case Files: Dire Grove! By Big Fish Games.

Search for clues, catch the criminal and become the detective you always wanted to be in this one-of-a-kind puzzler! By Big Fish Games.

A mysterious fortune teller has foreseen her demise at midnight this very day. Can you find the soul who seeks to kill Madame Fate? By Big Fish Games.

The highly-anticipated sequel in the Mystery Case Files smash hit series has arrived! Put on your gumshoes and let the super-sleuthing begin! By Big Fish Games.

Rumors surrounding the history of stately Ravenhearst Manor have circulated for decades. You're the detective and must solve the mystery of Ravenhearst Manor! By Big Fish Games.

Emma's soul is free. But a dark secret still lurks in Ravenhearst Manor. Return to Ravenhearst to continue this tale of twisted love. By Big Fish Games.

Danger is afoot in Mystery Chronicles: Murder Among Friends, a back-stabbing game of surprise and suspense! By Big Fish Games.

Just when Amelie has settled in for a week aboard a gorgeous ship, everyone else disappears, leaving her alone to find them!

Travel through historic London in an attempt to succeed where so many others before you have failed - uncovering the identity of Jack the Ripper! By Big Fish Games.

Enter the legendary town of Sleepy Hollow, search for clues to uncover the mystery of the Headless Horseman once and for all.

You've been invited to the long abandoned Paris Opera House. Find the phantom and discover the torment of this tragic hero!

Who stole the Moonstone diamond? Is it cursed? It's up to you to investigate the Victorian mansion and unravel the mystery! By Freeze Tag, Inc..

Explore the dark halls of Mortlake Mansion and discover its secrets! Break the evil spells and become the owner of the mansion!

Lillian's fianc'e, Christian, has been kidnapped by an evil witch! Help Lillian explore Christian's castle and save her love!

Help Jane learn her family's legacy and win the inheritance of an English castle by searching for hidden objects.

The only copy of this year's biggest blockbuster movie has gone missing the day before the VIP Hollywood premiere. Can you track it down? By SpinTop Games.

You are the world famous Mystery P.I., hired to find a winning $488 Million lottery ticket! Search the city to find clues to solve the case! By SpinTop Games.

An eccentric New York billionaire has hidden the will to his fortune somewhere in New York City! What are you waiting for? Start searching! By SpinTop Games.

It's the heist of the century and you, Mystery P.I., have just 16 hours to find and return the stolen money before the casino's grand opening! By PopCap Games.

Millions of dollars of gold has been stolen from an armored car. Find and return the gold before the trail goes cold! By SpinTop Games.

Banish the ghosts, uncover a mystery and live the adventure! In the haunted mansion, excitement is around every corner!

Find and track down clues on the missing animals. Uncover the dark secret that no one wants to believe is true! By Cerasus Media.

Solve the mystery of an apparatus from World War II, whose completion was prevented by the Nazis, that could solve the global energy problem! By Cerasus Media.

Solve the mystery of this beautiful island and dive into the ruins of the ancient Mayan sites of the Caribbean! By Cerasus Media.

Help the secret organization of Mystery Trackers find 3 missing celebrities in the mysterious Void family mansion!

Find clues to the secret of a small town in this thrilling detective story! Visit shops, question the residents and examine details to find the answers! By NevoSoft.

Return to the intrigue of Mysteryville! Join Laura through the shops of Eurekaberg where cleverly hidden items are waiting to be found! By NevoSoft.

An unseen prankster plagues the exclusive Redondo Spa! Now it's up to you, as Nancy Drew, to stop them before the clients retreat!

All is not well in Blackmoor Manor, a Fourteenth Century English mansion haunted by a tragic past. Can Nancy face her fears to find the truth? By Her Interactive.

You, as Nancy Drew, go undercover in Paris to unravel a case in style! By Her Interactive.

An unknown assailant has vandalized the whale-watching boat owned by Nancy's host, Katie Firestone. Nancy will explore Snake Horse Harbor to uncover the truth to this new mystery! By Her Interactive.

When Nancy gets a frantic note from a friend about horrible ghost dogs with glowing eyes and hideous howls, she sets off to get to the bottom of it! By Her Interactive.

The Hardy Boys have invited you, as Nancy Drew, on a train ride out West to solve a century-old mystery and the haunted train is their best clue. By Her Interactive.

You, as Nancy Drew and Bess Marvin, must find an unearthly artifact before it falls into the wrong hands! By Her Interactive.

Nancy Drew is called upon to help a friend renovate a beautiful Victorian mansion. But Nancy is about to stumble onto a secret that someone - living or dead - would rather keep unknown. By Her Interactive.

Travelling to the town of Titusville, Nancy Drew finds a contested will, a suffering girl & suspicious psychics. Can Nancy solve the mystery before time runs out? By Her Interactive.

An internship gives Nancy a crash course in Mayan culture. But when the artifacts go missing and the only clue is a mysterious scarlet handprint, she's on the case. By Her Interactive.

A crime has been committed at the local high school and it's up to you as Nancy Drew to crack the case! By Her Interactive.

As Nancy Drew, you'll pose as an extra on a television set filled with clues and plot twists. Look everywhere for evidence to discover the truth before the final curtain call. By Her Interactive.

You, as Nancy Drew, go to Hawaii and team up with the Hardy Boys to track an ancient legend throughout the islands. By Her Interactive.

When one of her high school friends gets kidnapped, Nancy Drew is plunged into a desperate race against the clock. By Her Interactive.

Play the part of Nancy Drew as she explores every inch of the Captain's Cove Amusement Park to investigate a series of frightening accidents. By Her Interactive.

The stakes have never been higher as Nancy Drew joins an international undercover investigation to track down a phantom thief in Venice. By Her Interactive.

A ranch vacation takes a terrifying turn when a ghostly horse appears. Can Nancy divine the truth from the ghost stories in this thrilling wild-west adventure? By Her Interactive.

Nancy Drew travels to the Canadian Rockies to investigate the Icicle Creek Lodge. Can you solve this mystery before someone leaves you out in the cold? By Her Interactive.

Assume the identity of supersleuth Nancy Drew as she unravels the mysterious happenings inside a castle full of riddles and rumors. By Her Interactive.

You'll encounter surprises around every turn as you help Natalie Brooks stop the Black Cat Gang from committing the ultimate crime of the century! By Alawar Friday's Games.

Explore an old house full of secrets and help Natalie Brooks find her inheritance in this thrilling adventure game! Begin the journey today! By Friday's Games.

Famous teenage detective Natalie Brooks must save her grandfather from kidnappers who are holding him ransom for an ancient treasure map! By Friday's Games.

Nick Chase is back in an all-new adventure! After a mysterious package arrives at his favorite bar, Nick has a new case!

Take on the role of a lowly stagehand in an opera company tasked with solving a deadly mystery in an isolated village!

A captivating hidden-object game with beautiful graphics, atmospheric music, challenging puzzles, and an engaging storyline. Can you find the mysterious Jaguar's Eye before it's too late? By PlayFirst.

Run a paranormal investigation business in this hidden object adventure game! By G5 Entertainment.

Use your Hidden Object skills to track down and stop the notorious Sweeney Todd! Find crucial clues to piece together the mystery.

Police Quest is the closest experience to being a police officer without having a badge. It includes four great games in one collection. By Vivendi.

A retired American private detective is hired to investigate a gruesome and ritualistic murder in 1920's Paris. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Travel the world, through more than 30 locations, meet crazy characters and solve amazing mysteries as a Private Eye! By Big Fish Games.

Bust an international crime ring and recover stolen diamonds in this globe-trotting mystery puzzle that's full of crime-fighting fun! By Joju Games.

Help Lora unravel the secrets of her family's history in Rasputin's Curse, a mind-bending hidden-object adventure from Sandlot Games! By Sandlot Games.

Can you unlock the truth of history's most infamous murderer? Journey back to 1888 on a manhunt to stop the legendary killer! By Gamers Digital.

As rookie FBI Agent Jennifer Lourdes, it's up to you to catch the infamous Unicorn Killer and bring him to justice! By Gamers Digital.

As an NYPD investigator, explore murder scenes to unravel the mystery behind the Poet Killer before he can strike again! By Merscom.

Nina is torn from her day-to-day routine when she discovers that her father has disappeared without a trace. As the police seem reluctant to help her, Nina sets off to look for clues. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Travel to London in 1895,where a wealthy construction tycoon lies dead in his mansion. You'll use the investigative skills of Sherlock Holmes to unravel a suspense-filled storyline with surprising plot twists and turns. By Ubisoft.

After your father dies, your sister Violet requests your help at the Family Castle. Get to the bottom of a dark mystery!

Embark on an investigation as Sherlock Holmes! Stop the legendary thief, Arsene Lupin, before he steals objects from England!

Journey to 19th Century London where Arsene Lupin, a young French burglar with an impressive track record, has just challenged Scotland Yard and the most famous of detectives - Sherlock Holmes. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Following a string of shocking disappearances on London's fog-choked streets, an entire nation trembles in fear. Can Sherlock Holmes uncover the perpetrators of this terror? The game is afoot! By CDV Software Entertainment.

Join Sherlock Holmes and Watson as they investigate the murder of an artist in this Puzzle-Adventure game.

Two US Marshals arrive at Shutter Island in search of a missing patient before her trail is washed way by a looming hurricane. By Merscom.

You only have three days to solve the murder of Walter Jones before the island sinks into the ocean forever. By Encore Software.

Victoria McPherson is a brilliant young FBI agent who's investigating a serial murder case in Chicago that turns out to have an uncomfortably high number of similarities between a seventy-five year old case in Europe. By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

Clair's partner has turned up dead, and police claim it was a suicide. Discover the truth in this fun Collector's Edition!

FBI Agent Claire Ellery must follow mysterious tarot cards, left by an anonymous source, to solve a sinister and bizarre case! By Big Fish Games.

Challenge your visual skills as you match suspects, piece together clues, and spot the differences in this Hidden Object game!

Samuel Gordon, has returned to his magnificent home, Black Mirror Manor, desperate to prove that the untimely death of his ancestor, William Gordon, was not just an 'unfortunate incident.' By Dreamcatcher Interactive.

A medium named Rosangela Blackwell and her spirit guide Joey Mallone must assist tormented spirits and investigate supernatural goings on in this gruesome mystery game. By Wadjet Eye Games.

A dynamic detective game set in the 1920s, you need all of your brains and wits to solve the murder mystery before time runs out! Mystery, Murders & Moustaches, what else can one hope for! By Draconus Entertainment.

Explore the cityscapes of Sweden and unravel the mystery surrounding the murder of a local artist in this clever Large File game! By Merscom.

Help Edmund get his ultimate revenge in this extraordinary hidden object game, based on the masterpiece novel by Alexander Dumas! By KozmoGames.

Help the Hardy Boys solve a crime wave and stop the Perfect Crime! It's up to the Boys to follow the clues and crack the case!

Take on the role of Tobias, a young and inquisitive monk, as you search for the truth in order to save a remote village! By Legacy Interactive.

An eccentric doctor's unconventional treatment methods have Becky Brogan scouring the grounds of a spooky Institute! By MumboJumbo.

Follow your favorite sleuth through cases of forgery, espionage, theft, murder and more, finding relevant clues for each of 16 mysterious stories! By uclick, LLC.

After a respected member of Parliament is found murdered, it's up to you to go on the search for the killer, the notorious Mr. Hyde!

Explore the mysterious theories behind the disappearance of the original Mary Celeste while trying to save yourself from a similar demise! By Merscom.

Start in the galleries of a Chicago museum and travel halfway across the globe in search of hidden objects used to decode secret puzzles! By PlayFirst.

Search Margrave Manor to uncover its secrets and discover your family's forgotten past in this Hidden Object thriller.

Vivien Ambrose has just discovered how to travel through time! Set off through history in Time Mysteries: Inheritance!

Follow legendary Carol Reed into a murdery mystery dating back to World War II in this point-and-click adventure. By Merscom.

After her father unexpectedly passes away, Mackenzie inherits the family business: a renowned detective agency in a fantastic world populated by mechanized butlers and walking skeletons. By Atlus.

A young woman who awakes in the back of a truck not knowing what happened, who she is, or what will happen next, lives her nightmare... By Game Agents.

Help the Unsolved Mystery Club find out what happened to the legendary aviator Amelia Earhart in this fun Hidden Object Adventure game!

From hush-hush to headlines, crack the story behind a scandalous celebrity murder to get your recognition as a top investigative reporter! By PlayFirst.

After having a strange vision, Veronica Rivers finds a mysterious warning! Veronica's vacation is about to end abruptly!

Patty Montanari must return to the mean streets of Brooklyn and confront both her past and the Mafia to save her son! Prevent Nino from following in his mother's footsteps in this atmospheric Hidden Object game. By Merscom.

Investigate this page-turning seek and find adventure with an all new storyline from one of America's bestselling authors, James Patterson! By Oberon Media.

Explore this beautiful city, puzzling your way through challenging obstacles on this mysterious guided tour! By Youda Games.
